# mdftracks

Reads the '.mdf' files generated by MTrackJ and convert it to a data.frame.

Example usage:

```{r, eval=F}
library(mdftracks)
data <- read.mdf('~/mdftracks.mdf', drop.Z = T)
head(data, 10)
```

```{r, echo=F}
library(mdftracks)
data <- read.mdf('~/stack/mtrackj/121120_RCM_HBC_cell density_complete_p04.mdf', drop.Z = T)
head(data, 10)
```

## Installation

With the `devtools` package installed:

```{r, eval=F}
install_github('burgerga/mdftracks')
```
